name: Custom Illustration Wedding Invitation Suite DEPOSIT
description:
This listing is the deposit for design/setup.

As seen in photos: invitation, rsvp/details card, quote card, enclosure tag w/string, illustrated map, inner enclosure, outer envelope w/liner (Wood piece and "Things to Do" enclosure, not included but available upon request).

{ DESIGN }
$250 setup fee and custom illustration

{ SUITE OPTIONS } $1.00 per piece unless otherwise indicated
Wedding Invitation
Envelope
Envelope Liner
Response Card
Response Card Envelope
Details Card: Accommodations, Registry, Reception
Map/Directions Card
Return Address
Enclosure Tag with String

{ SPECIALTY OPTIONS } price may vary based on materials
Custom Inner Enclosure
Fabric Enclosure
Stamp
Sticker
Wax Seal
Wood Veneer Cards


CONTACT FOR QUOTE

{ PAPER & PRINT }
As seen in photos: Digital print on vellum text/cover and illustrated map on birds-eye maple. 
Contact for additional print/paper options.

{ FOR QUOTES & ORDERS }
Please provide the following information: 

Subject line "Quote" or "Order"
Suite Options
Specialty/Paper/Print Requests
Photos/Colors

{ TIMELINE }
You will receive your first proof within 7-10 business days (M-F). Please allow 4-6 weeks for final product unless otherwise indicated. If rush is needed please contact me.

{ DISCOUNTS }
Receive 50% off ceremony & reception details with invitation order.
Contact for quote.

{ CONTACT } ampersand.ink [!at] gmail.com

name: Custom Illustration Wedding Poster
description:
Designed to capture the landscape of your "Big Day" and the signatures of all your guests.
You pick the style, wording and colors.
Wording Examples:
Before family and friends
BRIDE and GROOM
were united in marriage
on this day, the DATE of MONTH, in the year 2012
This ceremony was witnessed and celebrated by:

This Certifies that
BRIDE and GROOM
were united in
Holy Matrimony
According to the ordinance of God and the Laws of STATE
at CEREMONY LOCATION
on this DATE of MONTH in the year of our Lord
Two Thousand and Twelve

[ P R I N T  S I Z E ]
11x14 inches - up to 100 guest lines
16x20 inches - up to 200 guest lines 

Want a custom shape and size? Convo me.

You will receive a print ready PDF to take to your local print shop
or contact me for print and mail.

Once you have made your purchase please email: style, wording, color swatches, photos of bride, groom, wedding attire, venue or other landmark elements you would like represented.

Email: ampersand.ink@gmail.com
